SEARCH
Package com.smsapp.services.interfaces

Interface IExam

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExamImpl
public interface IExam
Provides methods for managing exam-related operations in the School Management System.

This interface defines the CRUD operations and additional methods for handling exam data. Implementations of this interface should provide the actual logic for interacting with the exam data in the database.

Author:
MonigaBalasubramanian

  • Method Details

    • addExam

      void addExam(Exam exam)
      Adds a new exam to the system.
      Parameters:
      exam - the Exam object to be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the exam object is null

    • getExamById

      Exam getExamById(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Retrieves an exam by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      Returns:
      the Exam object with the specified ID
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - if no exam with the specified ID is found

    • getAllExams

      Retrieves a list of all exams in the system.
      Returns:
      a List of Exam objects

    • updateExam

      void updateExam(Exam exam) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Updates the details of an existing exam.
      Parameters:
      exam - the Exam object containing updated information
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - if the exam with the specified ID does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the exam object is null

    • deleteExam

      void deleteExam(int examId) throws ExamNotFoundException

      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam to be deleted
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - if no exam with the specified ID is found

    • assignStudentsToExam

      void assignStudentsToExam(int examId, List<Integer> studentIds) throws ExamNotFoundException
      Assigns a list of students to an exam.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      studentIds - a List of student IDs to be assigned to the exam
      Throws:
      ExamNotFoundException - if no exam with the specified ID is found
      IllegalArgumentException - if the list of student IDs is null
